field_description: The time interval at which observations occur
The period of time to which the measured observation is intended to refer
Month of observation. For annual, it would bet set to 52
Combination of year and month (for monthly), year for (annual)
The country or geographic area to which the measured statistical phenomenon relates
Trade flow or sub-flow (exports, re-exports, imports, re-imports, etc.)
The primary partner country or geographic area for the respective trade flow
A secondary partner country or geographic area for the respective trade flow
Additional product classification to assist data search
Indicates the product classification used and which version (HS, SITC)
Flag to indicate whether the classification is reported by country or not
Product code in conjunction with classification code
Identification whether a product code has the most basic level (i.e.,sub-heading for HS)
The mode of supply on delivery of services (trade in services only)
The mode of transport used when goods enter or leave the economic territory of a country
Flag whether primary quantity is estimated or not
Flag whether secondary quantity is estimated or not
Flag whether net weight is estimated or not
Flag whether gross weight is estimated or not
Primary trade values (taken from CIF or FOB values)
Flag to indicate whether a record is reported by country
Flag to indicate whether a record is aggregated by UNSD
